# Semantic Search

## Semantic Search Attributes

Attributes for Semantic Search operations.

**Attributes:**

| Key | Stability | Value Type | Description | Example Values |
|---|---|---|---|---|
| <a id="operation-id" href="#operation-id">`operation.id`</a> | ![Development](https://img.shields.io/badge/-development-blue) | string | Unique identifier for the operation. | `op-123`; `batch-456` |
| <a id="operation-status" href="#operation-status">`operation.status`</a> | ![Development](https://img.shields.io/badge/-development-blue) | string | The status of the operation. | `success`; `failure`; `pending` |
| <a id="operation-type" href="#operation-type">`operation.type`</a> | ![Development](https://img.shields.io/badge/-development-blue) | string | The type of operation being performed. | `pomera`; `pom`; `processing` |

---

`operation.status` has the following list of well-known values. If one of them applies, then the respective value MUST be used; otherwise, a custom value MAY be used.

| Value  | Description | Stability |
|---|---|---|
| `failure` | Operation failed | ![Development](https://img.shields.io/badge/-development-blue) |
| `pending` | Operation is pending | ![Development](https://img.shields.io/badge/-development-blue) |
| `success` | Operation completed successfully | ![Development](https://img.shields.io/badge/-development-blue) |
